actions.name: Sharktoothed Longsword
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands. Against a target is wearing no armor, the reaver deals an extra die of damage with this sword.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
